name: Wicked OZ Puzzle
description:
Match 3 your way down the Yellow Brick Road with Wicked OZ Puzzle! The original creators of 'Wicked Snow White' presents another wicked match 3 puzzle game in the land of OZ, 'Wicked OZ Puzzle'.

Wicked OZ Puzzle is a ‘Play’ interpretation of new a twisted Story of the original  Wizard of OZ by L. Frank Baum.
The story follows “OZ vs Human intruders from Kansas” theme  adding a new fresh perspective of how OZ characters sees Human beings.

Throw Charms, Solve Puzzles, Collect OZ Characters & Meet the Wizard!

The unstoppably wicked game Wicked OZ puzzle is full of delightful new game modes, features and boss battles and its a great time killer.
Can't you give me brains? - L. Frank Baum
---------------------------------------------------------------------

For Daily Casual Players who
∙ Are tired of the same old match 3 games
∙ Want a quality time killer game
∙ Who are looking for game with airplane mode support ( Offline )
∙ Who are looking for game to play with children

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features
∙ The most unique match 3 puzzle ever
∙ Easy and fun to play
∙ More than 200 levels to start your way (Time Killer)
∙ Magic charms to help with those challenging levels
∙ Compete with Game Center and Facebook Friends
∙ Unlock Fun New Characters (L. Frank Baum)
∙ Can be played without internet connection offline (Airplane Mode)

---------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME MODES

• Collect Blocks, Balloons, Monkeys and many more
• Rainbow Mode, Collect colorful blocks in order
• Unravel new mysterious characters from the Wizard of OZ
• Find Wizard, The Wizard of OZ (L. Frank Baum)
• Great time killer & Supports offline play mode (Airplane Mode)
---------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

• Swipe and Match 4 in square to activate Magic Broom Spell
• Match 4 Plus Blocks to make Magic Carpets
• Time it right with Character Skill Charms
• Earn coins to upgrade mysterious OZ characters
• Supports offline play (Airplane Mode)

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you already a fan of the new Wicked OZ? Please like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest inside news offline:

Landing Page: www.wickedoz.com
Developer E-mail : help@cogooland.com
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/wicked.oz.puzzle/
Twitter : https://www.twitter.com/cogooland
COGOO: https://www.facebook.com/cogooland

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Wicked OZ Puzzle is optimized for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus
Minimum Requirement: iPhone 4S & iPad 2nd Gen
Can be played without internet connection offline (Airplane Mode)

Thank you for playing Wicked OZ
We were inspired by the original Wizard of OZ story written by L. Frank Baum.
